data.name: Fox Spirit Matchmaker: Fox Spirit Suusu
data.short_description: Tosan Suusu wishes to become a fully fledged fox spirit. However, to balance out the face that Suusu is not incredibly beautiful or intelligent like the rest of her clan, she is urged by her older sister, Tosan Yaya, to agree to an arranged marriage. Not willing to go along with her sister's...

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
